name: ReWeby
author: ReWeby

sections.description:
ReWeby plugin, helps to record and replay the admin users and others web activity. It records the activity of the users in your site where they click the most, what they view the most in your site.

Advanatages :

  • ReWeby records the admin users and nomral users click, mouse moves, and scroll activities on your site.
  • Helps to monitor the site handlers doing any illegal activities on the site.
  • Records the whole movements and activities that happens in website.

ReWeby Action Sample

About ReWeby

Record & Replay Registered Users or developers activity in your site. ReWeby is an other version of recording web activity.

About HITStacks

We are Web Development Company. We are planning for make everything automated.

What HITStacks Tell to Customers?

“Configure & take rest”
